methods.doc:
Truncates a given +text+ after a given number of words (words_count): truncate_words('Once upon a time in a world far far away', 4) # => "Once upon a time..." Pass a string or regexp :separator to specify a different separator of words: truncate_words('Once
upon
a
time
in
a
world', 5, separator: '
') # => "Once
upon
a
time
in..." The last characters will be replaced with the :omission string (defaults to "..."): truncate_words('And they found that many people were sleeping better.', 5, omission: '... (continued)') # => "And they found that many... (continued)"
